languages.text: Обугленные кости торчат из общей кучи пепла. На некоторых видны зазубрины — может быть от лезвия, может — от зубов.

traits.locale_text: Обугленные кости торчат из общей кучи пепла. На некоторых видны зазубрины — может быть от лезвия, может — от зубов.

languages.text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.
languages.original_text: Обугленные кости торчат из общей кучи пепла. На некоторых видны зазубрины — может быть от лезвия, может — от зубов.

traits.locale_text: Charred bones are sticking from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.
Charred bones are sticking from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.
Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.
Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.
Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

languages.text: 烧焦的骨头从一大堆灰烬中伸了出来。部分骨头带着划痕，可能是刀片或牙齿留下来的。
languages.original_text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

traits.locale_text: 烧焦的骨头从一大堆灰烬中伸了出来。部分骨头带着划痕，可能是刀片或牙齿留下来的。

languages.text: Unos huesos calcinados sobresalen de un enorme montón de ceniza. Algunos presentan arañazos que pueden haber sido causados por armas de filo o colmillos.
languages.original_text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

traits.locale_text: Unos huesos calcinados sobresalen de un enorme montón de ceniza. Algunos presentan arañazos que pueden haber sido causados por armas de filo o colmillos.

languages.text: 焼け焦げた骨の数々が大量の灰の山から突き出している。刃物や歯でついたと思しき引っかき傷がついている骨もある。
languages.original_text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

traits.locale_text: 焼け焦げた骨の数々が大量の灰の山から突き出している。刃物や歯でついたと思しき引っかき傷がついている骨もある。

languages.text: Des os carbonisés dépassent d'un énorme tas de cendres. Certains sont éraflés, comme s'ils avaient été attaqués par une lame ou des dents.
languages.original_text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

traits.locale_text: Des os carbonisés dépassent d'un énorme tas de cendres. Certains sont éraflés, comme s'ils avaient été attaqués par une lame ou des dents.

languages.text: Aus einem großen Aschehaufen ragen verkohlte Knochen heraus. Einige davon weisen Kratzer von einer Klinge oder Zähnen auf.
languages.original_text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

traits.locale_text: Aus einem großen Aschehaufen ragen verkohlte Knochen heraus. Einige davon weisen Kratzer von einer Klinge oder Zähnen auf.

languages.text: Kömürleşmiş kemikler, koca bir kül yığınından dışarı uzanıyor. Bazıları, bıçak veya diş izi gibi gözüken çiziklere sahip.
languages.original_text: Charred bones stick out from a massive pile of ash. Some bear scratches that may have been left by a blade or by teeth.

traits.locale_text: Kömürleşmiş kemikler, koca bil kül yığınından dışarı uzanıyor. Bazıları bir bıçak veya diş izi gibi gözüken çiziklere sahip.
